name: Skyward Spine
effect: Increases CRIT Rate by {0}% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on enemies have a 50% chance to trigger a vaccuum blade that deals {1}% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.
description: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's fire resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.
